title: Botting in co-op vs AI needs to stop being ignored by Riot
body:
Seriously, the amount of bot games I've been in the last 2 months where I am the only real player is getting disgusting. How is there no way to resolve this?

 I can't imagine how new players must feel jumping into these games that they can likely not carry themselves when all 4 of their team mates are suiciding mid over and over or just afking in random locations because their shoddy scripting screws up.

 I hear Dominion on other servers is just as bad. Wonder how ARAM is fairing with this, I don't play those modes but I know Dominion has a huge reputation for being botter heavy.

replies.body: the problem is that they ban 1 and these players just make 10 more

happens in aram from levels 1-29 all the time just report them and they will be banned permanently.
P.S. Riot don't ignore it they just don't get any reports or not enough.
